plugins.name: ResizeX
plugins.author: Anxeal
plugins.description: Lets you resize videos and images

plugins.name: p.complete
plugins.author: XFox Prower
plugins.description: p.complete is a BetterDiscord plugin that gives you IRC-style auto-completion on nicknames.

plugins.name: Latex Plugin
plugins.author: Mitchell
plugins.description: A really crappy latex embedder. Converts code between $$ into latex. click to expand

plugins.name: LazyLoad Patcher v1.0
plugins.author: HoLLy
plugins.description: For use with themes that change the size of elements that are lazily loaded.

plugins.name: Full Size Lightbox
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Show full sized images in image preview

plugins.name: Hashtag Plugin
plugins.author: Arashiryuu
plugins.description: Simply use the hash symbol '#' at the start of your word or sentence to get a distinct hashtag.

plugins.name: orangeText Plugin
plugins.author: Arashiryuu
plugins.description: Use a less-than symbol '<' at the end of a sentence to make text orange.

plugins.name: greenText Plugin
plugins.author: Arashiryuu
plugins.description: Use a greater-than symbol '>' at the beginning of a sentence to make text green.

plugins.name: Transparency Patcher v2.1
plugins.author: HoLLy
plugins.description:
Patches your Discord client to allow transparent themes.
To use, go to the plugin's settings, press the button, restart Discord COMPLETELY by closing it and re-opening it, then reload by pressing CTRL+R to enable transparency. If transparency is not working, just reload again.
NOTE: Not giving support, don't mention me for this. If something doesn't work, check the instructions again.

plugins.name: spoilerAlert
plugins.author: LuaTenshi
plugins.description: Allows you to hide your text as a spoiler by adding "!!" to the very start of your message.

plugins.name: BetterCustomCSS
plugins.author: kosshi
plugins.description: Lets you edit CSS live with your favorite text editor. Like Custom CSS but better.

plugins.name: Snow
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Snow

plugins.name: Quoter
plugins.author: samogot
plugins.description: Reply to people with a button, quoting full message or selected text

plugins.name: ReturnScroll
plugins.author: samogot
plugins.description: Button for counting unread messages

plugins.name: CountUnread
plugins.author: samogot
plugins.description: Button for returning to previous scroll position after posting a message

plugins.name: High-Quality Avatars
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Use crisp, high-resolution versions of avatars everywhere.

plugins.name: Static Avatars
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Don't animate avatars in the chat area.

plugins.name: Toggle All
plugins.author: Zerthox
plugins.description: Enable/Disable all plugins or themes with a button

plugins.name: Theme Customizer
plugins.author: Zerthox
plugins.description: Customize CSS variables of themes

plugins.name: EvenBetterDiscord
plugins.author: DeathStrikeV
plugins.description: Loads FFZ emotes from alternate repository

plugins.name: Line Numbers
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Add line numbers to code blocks.

plugins.name: Kawaii Emotes
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Better emote parsing for BetterDiscord. Fixes bugs with emotes and tooltips.

plugins.name: BetterDiscord Beta Test
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Enables certain beta features before they're implemented to BetterDiscord

plugins.name: Server Themes
plugins.author: DeNial
plugins.description: Allow individual servers to use specific themes.  More instructions on repo: https://github.com/IRDeNial/BD-Server-Themes/blob/master/README.md

plugins.name: Creation Date
plugins.author: Natsulus
plugins.description: See when a user's account was created.

plugins.name: Hide Images
plugins.author: Anxeal
plugins.description: Adds a button to the right-click menu to hide images on certain servers and channels

plugins.name: Colored Typing
plugins.author: Anxeal, Bolli
plugins.description: Make the text color of the "typing..." text same as role color

plugins.name: Colored Voice
plugins.author: Anxeal
plugins.description: Make the text color of the names in the voice channel same as role color

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.author: Mitchell
plugins.description: Give anyone a nickname that only you can see simply by right clicking on them.

plugins.name: Copy Code
plugins.author: Finicalmist
plugins.description: Copies Code from Code Blocks with a Button

plugins.name: Better Plugin Repo
plugins.author: samfun123
plugins.description: A upgraded plugin repository for #plugin-repo. A preview of it here: https://imgur.com/8fAgy1Y Update: Made installation happen automatically. (Not to be affiliated with EvenBetterRepo)

plugins.name: Channel Collapse Button
plugins.author: IRDeNial
plugins.description: Create a button that allows for hiding of channel list

plugins.name: Autoplay GIF and GIFV
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Automatically play GIF and GIFV embeds and Nitro avatars without having to hover.

plugins.name: Custom role colour
plugins.author: Jiiks, Pohky
plugins.description: Set any colour as role colour

plugins.name: Media Support
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Add support for html5 media

plugins.name: Server/Channel Sorter
plugins.author: CosmicSalad
plugins.description: Drag and Drop to reorder the list of servers and channels

plugins.name: Avatar hover
plugins.author: noVaLue
plugins.description: When hovering, show a resized version of the avatar. Use Ctrl / Ctrl+Shift

plugins.name: Double click edit
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Double click your messages to edit them - quite hacky

plugins.name: Emote Blacklist
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Blacklist emotes you don't want to see

plugins.name: Digital Clock
plugins.author: Jiiks
plugins.description: Add a clock to your client. Use the #clockPluginClock selector to style it yourself

plugins.name: Replyer
plugins.author: Hammock
plugins.description: @ Reply someone with a button

plugins.name: Collapsible Embeds
plugins.author: shtrih
plugins.description: Creates caret to hide image/video previews near each link

plugins.name: EmbedAV
plugins.author: shtrih
plugins.description: Creates <video> or <audio> for links and attachments.

plugins.name: CompactGuilds
plugins.author: Kosshi
plugins.description: Reduces sidebar's width or hides it completetly by displaying it only when cursor is near left edge.

plugins.name: Quicksave
plugins.author: Kosshi
plugins.description: Lets you save images fast with a short random name (Or the original if you want to)

plugins.name: Fave Emote Sorter
plugins.author: Hammock
plugins.description: Drag & Drop rearrange your list of favourited emotes

plugins.name: detTube
plugins.author: megamit
plugins.description: Deatch youtube to make it moveable

plugins.author: Ciaran
plugins.description: Switch channels quickly via the keyboard. Just press ctrl+k

plugins.name: Search Plugin
plugins.author: megamit
plugins.description: The return of ctrl+f!  Until at least discord devs decide to add it

plugins.name: Direct Media Converter
plugins.author: samfun123

plugins.name: Automatic Link Unshortener

plugins.description: Checks for common link shorteners and converts them to the original link.

plugins.name: Owner Tags
plugins.author: noodlebox
plugins.description: Show a tag next to a server owner's name.

plugins.name: MorkMoji

plugins.description: Enlarges emoji in messages to 64px (or custom size configurable in settings panel)

No support will be given for the transparency patch.

themes.description:
CSS for hiding content marked as spoiler, that will show only on hover.
